name: Mouse Trap Hotel
overview: It's no vacation! Join Maxie Mouse as he races from the basement to the posh penthouse of the Mousetrap Hotel! You'll get a "mouse-eye" view of the action as you travel through this hectic hotel maze. Danger lurks behind every door and on every floor! Beware of vicious vacuum cleaners, barbed bedsprings, stomping feet and all kinds of snap happy mousetraps! Along the way, stop for cheese and cookie treats! They'll give you the extra strength you need to defeat dozens of hotel horrors! Make it to the penthouse and step inside...WOW! It's worth the trip!
